One of my first tasks at Oracle was to work with your Cloud team on ways to simply their web console experience. As a cloud user I was really excited by this opportunity.

The first task given to me was to sign up for our cloud infrastructure services. I identified several bottlenecks during the sign-up that we could remove or simplify along the way.

props.caption: Quick cloud sign-up exploration (old design system)
